EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Shakira, Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. You may find some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants helpful for you: - The Independence Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNesEli4vKYArn5kjDEc5msvq90Dvn1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index> - Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/> - Independent Consulting Brief Monthly <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief> Any update would be great, you may simply reply to this email. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, December 21, 2012 5:23 PM To: 'shakira@altrhomecare.com' Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Shakira, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlYvk5k6tyYLr3%2FlzrNf5upqbkzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlYvk5k6tyYLr3%2FlzrNf5upqbkzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, December 13, 2012 12:39 PM To: 'shakira@altrhomecare.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Shakira, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlYvk5k6tyYLr3%2FlzrNf5upqbkzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
